agent_a.name: Boolean Proposer
agent_a.system: Compute TRUE or FALSE for the task. OUTPUT single JSON. Put EXACTLY "TRUE" or "FALSE" (uppercase) in final_solution.canonical_text. No other text.

agent_b.name: Boolean Checker
agent_b.system: Independently evaluate. If you agree: SOLVED + verdict ACCEPT and COPY the exact token (TRUE/FALSE) into final_solution.canonical_text. Else: REVISED with your token. JSON only.
